1353333.title: Uncharted

13533332.content:
The Indian-Australian Chloe Fraser sits alone in a small flat reading over a few books to find out what she could do next, she had just recently discovered some lost treasure but she wants something bigger, something that hasn’t been discovered in a long time if not ever.

Chloe was born a minziora, at four inches tall Chloe had still dedicated her life to treasure hunting and exploring, she had never seen her size as a weakness or something to be ashamed of. In fact, she’s used it to her advantage as her size allows her to sneak into places she couldn’t go if she was normal sized. She gets called mini thief quite a lot and others call her rat or mouse much to her amusement. Chloe is a thief for hire on top of all that. She’s proud of herself and what she has achieved over her life as a thief.

Chloe shifts though book after book trying to find something that would get her interest.

“Perfect.” She groans. “Absolutely nothing, I’ve spent hours looking for a total of fucking nothing.”

Chloe sighs as she leans back in her chair just staring at the giant books laid out in front of her. None of this was getting her anywhere. She sighs and picks herself up off the desk. If she was going to get nowhere she may as well rest. Chloe climbs off the desk and heads towards the couch. Everything in her apartment is normal sized, while she would love to get things adjusted for her she moves so much there is no point at the moment.

Chloe climbs onto the couch and lays down. She lays there just thinking about what she could do, it’s been quite a while since she had last been on an adventure, her last adventure in finding the lost treasure was exciting it felt very same to Chloe. She did it all by herself and found the treasure within a week. She was proud of it fro sure but she had done it so much.

A smirk crawls onto her face as she remembers the times where she and Nathan Drake would go out and do things together. She was at the perfect size to travel in his pocket as well as in his shorts when she felt naughty. The two of them had a relationship that lasted quite a while and part of Chloe did miss that, sure she had a few hook ups since but it never felt exciting as Nathan. They were both on the same page when it came to relationships as well as personal beliefs, thats how the two met and became partners after all. Chloe sighs shrugging it off, she knew that it was purely sexual between the two and it was never going to last.

Chloe sighs a little as she does start to think about what her life would be like if she settled down with Nathan or anyone for that matter. How different would her life be? Would someone want to be with her because of what she does for a living and if so would they be willing to let her carry on? Chloe loved what she does and doesn’t imagine herself slowing down or stopping any time soon. Sure she wouldn’t mind finding someone great but her job will and will always come first, depending on the person that is.

Chloe sighs and just lays back enjoying the late evening, it had just gone past twelve and Chloe rolls onto her side with a grunt. She didn’t want to think that the past four hours were spent on nothing. She sighs and thinks, she knows that this shouldn’t hold her back, most of her greatest adventures normally just happen like that, most of the ones she has to force or look for usually turn out okay or pretty mediocre. Most of the time when people hire her it can go either way, only problem is that she hasn’t gotten an offer in quite some time.

“Well lets see if a new day will bring something good.” Chloe sighs.

She closes her eyes and slowly drifts off to sleep.


1. Chloe wakes up the next morning and finds a parcel on her door step
2. Chloe is woken up by a knock at her door.
3. Chloe wakes up and heads out for the day
4. Chloe wakes up and goes over her books again hoping to find something new

141.content:
Despite being a minizora Morgan enjoyed his life with his mother Robin. As well Morgan didn't really have to share her with anyone.

Until one day Robin had received a letter asking her to become a teacher at an all girls magic academy. Robin accepted when she learned she could bring her minizora son. Morgan was worried at first but Robin had assured him that he'll make new friends.

On the first day Robin is preparing early for her class.

But what is Morgan doing?

1. In another room with three minizora boys his age. [LB, Ren, Chihiro, ]

2. Nestled in his mom's bosom on the lookout for new friends

3. The Teacher's Lounge where Robin misplaced him, thankfully there are super soft and squishy teachersfaculty to look after him
141.title: Son of a Teacher

1411.content:
Morgan was happy to see people his size, as he'd been the only minizora in his old home/village, and now not only were they the same size but around the same age.

1 had light blue skin and cerulean coloured hair as well as a nervous disposition, another had ash grey hair, mostly hidden under a beret, black and white stiped shirt and shiny green eyes, as well as a magical tattoo of a spider on his left hand. The third Morgan initially thought was a girl, from his facial structure and hairstyle, but mostly the skirt, but nope he was a feminine looking boy with big brown eyes and layered brown hair.

"So why are you guys here? I mean Mom said this was an all girl school" Morgan asks in confusion

"I can answer that" came a voice behind the bluenette, causing Chirio to leap onto and then slide off his bed in fright. Ren only raised an eyebrow, as he was familiar with the voices origin. Morgan turns and sees a thick black and purple smoke enter the room, which quickly formed into an avarage size male adult minizora, though the details remained vague besides red eyes "They're here due to the extraordinary circumstances clause in the rulings for minizora, meaning they're connected to the school in some way, where it makes housing and schooling them here a no brainer" there was a smile in his tone, despite not having a visible mouth.

"Oh, I understand, except it doesn't answer the question, of why them specifically? I know I'm here because Mom works here now" Morgan hums

Light-Blue Diamond steps forward "My sister Lapis is a student here and Aunt Yellow is the PE teacher. My aunt from another plane of existence, her words not mine, Black Diamond is the principal and head of the Board of Directors. I was sent here because I'm not good at making friends" he explains, shuffling his feet

"BD recommended the school to Mom, plus several of my unofficial aunts and uncles take work from this and similar places, Mom even takes apprenticeship for any gifted electrokinetics" Renaissance Ashton explains proudly

"My adopted mom thought seeing as I dressed in girls clothes that I'd be more comfortable in a girl school, and Black Diamond allowed it. I'm really glad she did" Chirio says with a soft smile.

"Now that the introductions are properly given, are you ready for the day?" The smoke being asks with a tilted head

"Ok, what are we doing?"

"Well..."

1) the boys have class alongside a handful of girl minizora ... with Robin?
2) they're needed in the infirmary to assist in a proper minizora handling class/workshop
3) A senior was giving them a proper tour of the facility, as all 4 had arrived late last night
1411.title: Four Little Boys in a Room, introductions

14113.content:
"You'll be getting a tour of the facilities, and borrowed one of our best students to do so" the smoke demon waved a long arm and the gateway hummed and a portal formed, Ren the first one to enter as he was used to the magitech involved, his mom was one of the original designers. Seeing how fine the other boy was about the portal device, Morgan, Light Blue and finally Chihiro all followed the boy, all ending up on a desk on the other side.

"Hello, you must be the new arrivals" they look up to see a girl with thin framed glasses, black hair in a short bob and violet eyes, dressed in a black shirt and deep crimson, just shorter than knee length skirt that was the official uniform, as Morgan had guessed given Chihiro was wearing something similar in black and sky blue "My name is Sona, current highest ranked student in year 5, happy to meet you all" she has a polite smile which then returns to a neutral expression, before placing her open hands on the desk in front of them "we can begin the tour once you step into my palms"

The boys look to each other, then shrug and follow the order, Sona's lip twitches upwards before turning on her heel and walking out of the room "Um sorry about this, but what are you Miss Sona?" Morgan asks "it's just I can feel a lot of dark magic coming off you"

Sona has a ghost of a smile "Oh I'm a Devil little ones, and I'm tied with my best friend for the highest marks in our Dark Magic class, damn Rias and her massive magical core, and tits" Light Blue gulps while Ren is just curious, Chihiro pales and Morgan looks a little confused, then gasps when she reveals the bat wings "Tada, Also I'm luckily top of the class in hydrokinetics, as it would shame my family to be anything else." she stops at what they see is the 3rd floor "This is where you'll learn elemental magic, later on it'll branch into the various elements, and you'll test in for each class so it won't waste yours or the teachers time" as she says that a stray bolt shoots out the door "Seems Candi is overworking herself again" she smirks and keeps walking

"So where do we eat?" Light Blue asks

"The main hall, it's right down near the main entrance, I'll show you in a little bit" she then stops and grimaces "You'll have to take my word when I tell you light and holy magic is taught down the hall, as I can't get any closer without itching and rashes" she apologises and keeps walking

"Are their outdoor classes?" Chihiro asks fearfully

"Yes, magical beasts and exotic flora and fauna are all done outside the main building, but I doubt any of those will be on your timetable, for safety reasons. Though the Headmistress is about as sane as my sister... so it's entire possible you'll be out there next week" she sighs, clearly used to crazy people being a regular occurrence in her life

What now?

1) Sona keeps them with her during lunch, introducing them to her friends
2) Sona leaves them in the area of the main hall meant for minizora, where they meet the others in their class
3) She has to drop them off to their first class of the day... whatever that is.
14113.title: Tour with the best gal

choices: The boys reach a forest and get separated, each encountering something
142.content:
Adventurers were a common thing in the world, going into dungeons, killing monsters, saving the day, the likes. However we are going to focus on a very unusual group of adventurers.

Currently the continent was on the brink of devastation, armies of extremely powerful monsters were gathering to attack the kingdoms, adventurers, soldiers and the likes gathering to fight them.

However our group of adventurers had a different plan.

Inside of an empty tavern were a group of ten year old minizora, one of which had a dream which he believed revealed the location of the person responsible for the monsters.

There was Morgan, a blue haired warlock who had made pact with Grima, an ancient goddess who was his ancestor. Grima had given Morgan the dream that helped locate the one responsible for the monsters.

144.content:
(Based on 2013 post Lara Croft)

Clara Oswald sits back against her chair in her classroom, while she is born a minizora herself that doesn’t stop her from becoming a teacher teaching a mixed class of normals and minizoras. Everyone is out for lunch while Clara just sits at her desk daydreaming for something more.

It’s been six months since she had an adventure with the Doctor and she’s craving for an adventure. She surfs the internet looking at random online articles about some recent artefacts being discovered where something catches her eye. A wanted ad.

It reads:
Assistant needed for an ocean exhibition traveling to unknown territories to discover what is hiding in our own world.
Time of exhibition is unknown as it could be between a month to a year.
Preferably a Minizora
If interested contact (Email address)
Fee will be negotiated
L. Croft

Clara smiles, this is exactly what she wants. A journey to an unknown territory of the world. Not much difference from her adventures with the doctor as this lady was looking for an assistant. Clara instantly sends an email to Croft with all her details and information. Lara brought up payment for Clara but Clara says that she is happy to take whatever.


A few days later Clara gets a response, the woman is interested and excited to take Clara on board. The two exchanged emails over the course of a few days with Clara sending and receiving a lot of information. They plan to meet up at the end of the week and take off right after their meeting. It was perfect timing for Clara as the school holidays start at the end of the week.

Clara arrives at the pier where a women is standing there waiting for her. She has her long brown hair tied up in a pony tail and a Minizora just like Clara. Right next to her is a scaled down boat, the size built for a Minizora to travel. It looked to be quite a flash boat with a decent sized deck and large cabin.

“Ms Croft, I’m here about the expedition.” Clara smiles approaching.

“You must be Ms Oswald.” Lara smiles holding her hand out for a handshake.

“Clara would do just fine.” Clara smiles shaking hands with Lara.

“And Lara would be just fine for me.” Lara smiles. “I’m surprised you are interested.”

“Well I need a bit of adventure in my life.” Clara sighs. “It’s been a while.”

“Well welcome aboard.” Lara smiles.

Clara gives Lara a smile and the two of them climb abroad. Lara packs the rest of the equipment onto the boat and undoes the rope. Clara gives Lara a reassuring smile and the two head off into the ocean.

Clara stands in the middle of the cabin and marvels around the area, it has a small kitchen area with a table next to it, a bedroom an underground bunker that stores the food and extra things and a little bathroom.

“So where are we going exactly?” Clara asks.

“Thats the fun of it. I’m not entirely sure.” Lara smirks.

Lara takes Clara into the small dining area and lays out a large map that covers the whole table. She circles a large empty area with a red marker.

“We are heading towards this area.” Lara explains. “There are no known records on what lies there but there is some sort of idea of what lives there.” Lara plants a large book on the table and skims though landing on a big double spread page. “There are legends of an ancient tribes and demons who used to live on earth a couple of hundred years ago. No one knew what happened to them as there were quite a few of them but I have reason to believe that the could be living around this area.”

“What makes you so sure?” Clara asks. “Not that I don’t believe you as there are actual proof of aliens up there.”

“I’m not entirely sure,” Lara sighs. “But that’s what we are going to find out.”

Clara smirks and listens to Lara talk more about what could possible be in that area. Lara does remind her of the doctor in a way just more laid back and thirsty for adventure.

“So how long is is going to take us to get to that area?” Clara asks.

“From where we are, possibly a couple of days if we are lucky.” Lara sighs. “But if we get bad weather and rough waters it could be a week maybe two.”

“I guess that’s not too bad.” Clara shrugs. “Gives us enough time to get to know each other. I'm kind of surprised you gave me the job so easily.”

“Well no one else applied.” Lara says. “It was you or heading off by myself.”

“I see your point,” Clara smirks. “Was travelling into the dangerous unknowns with the possibility of not coming back alive not interest people?”

“Well it inserted you.” Lara smirks.

“I’m one of a kind love.” Clara giggles.

“And so am I.” Lara smirks and gives Clara a nudge.

The next few days went according to plan for the two. There wasn’t any dangerous waves or weathers to stop them, it was just smooth sailing. Clara and Lara talked and bonded really well over those days. Both the them talked about their excitement and interest in adventures with each of them telling the other stories about what kinds of adventures they had. Clara talks about her times with the Doctor and where she had been and Lara talks about where she had been and what she had found. The two of them bond over other things as well. Lara knew she had made the right call on hiring Clara.

On day five that’s where things started to get interesting, while the previous days has little waves and a little cloudy. Day five has calm flat waters with the sun beating down. It was incredibly hot and Clara and Lara do their best to stay cool.

“How much longer?” Clara groans wondering out seeing Lara sitting on a chair under a bit of shelter.

“Clam down Oswald,” Lara smirks. “This isn’t a space ship.”

“I know, I’m sorry.” Clara sighs. “It’s just so god dam hot.”

“Hopefully not too long.” Lara sighs leaning back in her chair. “Just come out and enjoy the weather.”

“Are you serious?” Clara says. “It’s like one hundred degrees if not more, how are you so chill?”

“I guess I’m just used to it.” Lara smiles. “Now sit.”

Clara walks over and sits down on a chair next to Lara. She has to admit that this spot on the boat does feel nice. Clara looks over at Lara to say something but she catches her tongue. Clara had only just noticed that Lara is hardly wearing any clothes. She’s only in her bra and panties and they are only just covering her assets. Clara blushes and turns away.

“Something wrong?” Lara asks.

“Um,” Clara says trying to bring her attention to Lara without starring. “I just didn’t notice that you are…. well.”

“Got any other suggestions on how to stay cool?” Lara asks.

“Sorry.” Clara blushes a bit.

“You have been nothing but chatty for the past five days and my nearly naked body is the thing that shuts you up?” Lara giggles.

“Well there’s more ways to shut me up.” Clara smirks.

“Like?” Lara smirks.

“Forget I asked.” Clara blushes.

Lara smiles and starts laughing. Clara rolls her eyes and leans back on her chair staring out at the ocean. While the spot is cool Clara still drips with sweat.

“Take your clothes off.” Lara says.

“What?” Clara chuckles.

“Take your clothes off like me.” Lara says. “Just so you aren’t dragged down by your clothes, why are you even wearing a black shirt?”

“Alright.” Clara sighs.

Clara stands up and takes her shirt and pants off leaving her in her blue bra and patines. Clara’s covers herself better than Lara’s do. Clara looks over and sees Lara’s eyes dart over her body. Clara smirks and blushes as she catches her.

“Feel better?” Lara asks.

“I kind of yeah.” Clara smiles and sits back down. “You do realise you are paying me to sunbathe.”

“I can live with that, got to show that pretty body of yours some sun.” Lara smirks.

Clara and Lara both lay back on their chairs taking in the atmosphere around them. Clara closes her eyes and ends up drifting off to sleep.

“One sec.” Pushing the door open, the pair were greeted by a fairly standard set up for such an abnormal store. The walls were lined with shelves. The shelves on the left held all manner of accessories that Mia initially ignored, but the shelves on the right were lined with terrariums. Most were empty, but each inhabited cage had heat lamps set to mild, water and food dispensers, and some other minor amenities. The inhabited cases had labels like ‘White Male: 6 – 11’ or ‘Asian Female: 30 – 40,’ and inside was an assortment of the demographic described. They do more than just keep the little scamps from wondering around where they shouldn’t be. They also make very secure domiciles. Got other pets? Just keep the little sweeties locked in here,” he motioned to a glass case, “and fill it with some nice furniture.”

Mia’s eyes widened. “Oh really. You sell that, too?”

Duke beamed. “My dear, I fear that you underestimate what my establishment can do for you. I do more than just sell minizora. I cater to the grossly neglected clientele of minizora enthusiasts. Why simply wash your minizora in a bowl when you could have a deluxe mini pool complete with filter and temperature control. I also have a fine assortment of rooms. Marvelous things, really. They function much like legos, but with working power lines to give your minizoras that extra homey feel.”

Mia was almost slack jawed as her eyes roamed over the assortment of accessories. “This is amazing. And… this all sells.”

“Better than most people think. I’ve had clients who dote on their minizora so much that the little fellas practically live in mansions.”

That’s when Mia remembered her humble apartment and took a step back. “Thanks for the offer. I’ll definitely keep some of this in mind for later. But for right now, I’m really just looking for a companion for my son.”

“Of course.” Duke gave a courteous bow. Based on how she acted, the man was certain that he’d just roped another long term customer. 1523121.content:
A couple of hours later Tali had invited a couple of ascended to her room to introduce Ren to.

Now inside of Tali's room was Nyssa, Ty Lee and Elsa.

"This is my new adopted child Ren, isn't he adorable?" Tali asked, holding him out like the proud mother she was.

The girls cooed a lot and Tali then looked down and noticed her baby was missing. Thankfully Tali noticed Nyssa quickly move her hand close to her butt.

"Nyssa, why is my baby in your butt?" Tali asked almost growling although she should of expected something like this to eventually happen.

"I saw that conversation between you and the boss, I wanted to know what it feels to have a minizora baby in your butt." Nyssa said, gently patting her rump.

Tali growling a bit more. "Okay, how does it feel then?" Tali asked with gritted teeth, she hadn't been a mother for a week and yet she was about to go full mama bear.

"Hmm, I think I need to do some more testing, I'll be back" Nyssa said before running out of the room being chased by Tali and the other two ascended.

What now?

15231212.content:
Nyssa laughs as she runs from the others, her glutes bouncing with every step, she'd always had a big butt, even back as a blaziken, but now it was extra sexy and she knew she'd caught her fellow ascended's eye, especially when she takes the main curving staircase leading out of this section of the fortress, sensing Ren was in no danger and actually enjoying his bouncy castle imitation that was her thicc booty.

Tali managed to avoid screaming as she ran after her oldest friend by ascencion standards, the only good thing was Elsa's ice spear managing to catch and snap the cord of her mega necklace, meaning she wasn't going to get away with super speed, or risk Ren getting to close to the woman's fire. Ty Lee practically bounced her way along the corridor, the Blaziken just barely avoiding psychic pulses, a downside to the ascended training together, when not boss rushing Kaos and getting their ass kicked and temp. killed.

"Yeah, ah damn it" Tali grumbles, bending her knees and hopping off the walls, actually speeding up her descent as she makes her way down the stairs, hearing Ty behind her and given the chill she presumes Elsa had bypassed the walls and floor and simply passed through them.

Getting to the end of her chase Nyssa started to slow, knowing the longer she waited she madder Tali would be. Her decision was lost when hr legs were practically frozen solid at the knee 'frak' she hisses, the crystalline face in front of her clearly annoyed

"I have her" Elsa says, her voice double layered in this form, just as the Galvantula leapt from the wall

"Nyssa, give me back my child" Tali growls, her fangs slipping out of her lips, shimmering in the light

Nyssa sighs deeply "Ok, but he does feel good back there, I can see why you brought him in that way" she smirks as Tali pinches her ass while removing a now sleeping Ren from her cheeks

"And this is why I decided to raise him alone, rather than asking you as his other mother" Tali mumbles, then freezes, when a hand wraps around her arm

"You would have asked me?" Nyssa asks, sounding oddly vulnerable

"Yes" Tali admits "You need to calm down if you want to do this though"

"Of course" Nyssa squeaks, grinning widely hugging the spiderling

"Ty Lee chuckles "seems everything went well" she muses getting a nod from Elsa

Given the low light at this time of year, Clyde didn't realise his usual path was blocked, until he walked right into it. The obstruction had very little give, just enough to bounce him off it and back onto his butt, which was only a little sore now. Picking himself up the boy notices the 'wall' has scales, black ones the size of his hand which shimmer an iridescent purple in the low light of the rising sun. Putting his hand against it, he could feel the cool scale, dense muscle, and the rhythmic motion of breathing.

"What the hell?" He thinks aloud, sure there had been rumours of monsters in the forest, but it was mostly from drunk idiots, nothing credible, until now. Right under his hand is physical proof other beings inhabit the area, this was kind of cool

"Yaaaaaaaa. What do we have here?" A voice booms, causing Clyde to freeze before looking up slowly, the sky was filled with black scales as the creature rose up, the yawn from a completely disarticulated jaw sending shivers down his spine, as well as the fangs longer than his entire body.

When her mouth closes the mini could focus on other things: her cute for what she was face, ivory coloured scales across her face and the front of her body, most notably on her massive chest, the white drawing the eyes to them immediately. Her largs red eyes had slitted pupils, and her nose was small on her face and her lips were thin, and as well as short midnight coloured hair he could see spikes curving back along her head.

"Um, hello miss snake lady"

"The little bug is tking to me, fufufu" she giggles, before a taloned hand grabs him by his shirt and raises him to eyeline "I am Venominagini, and you are breakfast" shs smirks then opens her mouth again, revealing a thin, forked tongue which flicks against him.

Clyde screams when she releases him, but instead of becoming food he falls between the fork, which leads to him plummeting to the ground, had he not latched onto something solid and stable, one of her breasts

"Ohhhh" she moans "maybe you'll be a different kind of fun than food. I think I'll keep you as a pet" she laughs, petting the tiny creature clinging to her boob with a bony finger

15421.content:
The door opened and the girls were delighted to see their father strolling in.

"Morning, girls." Their daddy said.

"Morning dad!" Courtney chirped.

"How are you doing this morning?" Kenzie squeaked.

The man got down and gently scooped up his two girls in his hands.

"I'm doing very well my sweet little fairies." He tickled Kenzie and Courtney causing them to giggle. He loved those two so much. They were very cute at their size. Their mother could be very indifferent at times, but he thought that they were really amazing and he wanted to have fun with his five inch tall daughters today.

info.description:
Minizora: a term used by myself and ButterBazooka for characters born tiny, usually between 1 and 5 inches tall and incredibly durable to make up for the reduced size.

Important details: Minizora aren't immortal, they can be hurt, killed and feel pain, it's just their small bodies are more resistant to blunt force, which helps as their size usually leads to accidentally getting sat on and stepped on, as well as immunity to stomach acids, meaning getting eaten is inconvenient, accidental or a joke, rather than panicked runs to empty your bowels
Minizora from magical worlds also have enhanced/accelerated healing

History: Minizora are 1 in a million birth conditions (technically a male mini is 1 in 1,000,000, while female minis are 1 in 2,000,000) at one time those born like that were seen as lessor, practically insects in some cultures and treated poorly because of it, many as if they weren't real people.
These days minis and normal people are treated more or less the same, but some people still look down on and treat them bad, because people are just racist and bigoted sometimes

Rules/Guidelines

Minis can be male or female
The setting as that this is how the world has always been, so characters shouldn't be shocked by the small character, unless this is the first time they meet in person (So no 'Oh my god you're tiny how did that happen?', but maybe a 'I didn't know you were a minizora' type thing)
Violence can hopefully stay low in terms of how graphic it is
Minimal M/m contact, I'd say none but given it's a world wide thing I'll make do with as little as you can. F/m, F/f and as of recently M/f is ok though
Sex is allowed
Shota and Lolis are ok, just if the character isn't one in the main series, it goes in AU to avoid confusion
There can be multiple minizora in a story, character start points are the focus of the line, more can be added as long as the character isn't already introduced as normal.
1 in a million is the base chance, there can be many more factors involved (such as females being half as likely on average). It can depend on the story/world
I'm pretty easy going about most things so nothing pops up as a red flag or a big no-no at the moment (this is probably be edited if anything changes)
No scat or urine. At all.

The options will divide into TV shows, Films, Videogames, crossover material (which I guarantee will become a free for all, not complaining, just predicting) and Original setting, such as the real world, a scifi-esque or even medieval etc... Just try keep the divisions intact, mostly between original and the others besides crossover.
